Package ac.uk.nottingham.ningboport.controller

Implement and provides interface to access local data, e.g., session and tasks.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocalDataManager
    Provides method to update session and task list, and also provides methods to return session and tasks objects.
    LoginTask
    Send login request and waiting for response asynchronously.
    PeriodicUpdater
    This class is sort of network manager.
    SettingsArrayAdapter
    The list view adapter for settings activity.
    TaskArrayAdapter
    The list view adapter for TaskList activity.
    UpdateTask
    Send update request and waiting for response asynchronously.

Package ac.uk.nottingham.ningboport.controller Description

Implement and provides interface to access local data, e.g., session and tasks. Implement and provides interface to handle network communications.
Author:
Jiaqi LI
